parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the gusset

parameters.name: DirType
parameters.description: Direction in which to extrude the gusset: 0 = left side 1 = center 2 = right side

parameters.name: LocType
parameters.description: Location of the reference plane for the sketch of the gusset: 0 = start point 1 = midpoint 2 = end point

parameters.name: BIsProfile
parameters.description: True to use a polygon profile, false to use a triangle

parameters.name: ProfileD1
parameters.description: Length for Direction 1

parameters.name: ProfileD2
parameters.description: Length for Direction 2

parameters.name: ProfileD3
parameters.description: Length for Direction 3

parameters.name: ProfileAngle
parameters.description: Value for profile angle

parameters.name: ProfileD4
parameters.description: Length for Direction 4

parameters.name: BOffset
parameters.description: True to offset the reference plane for the sketch, false to not

parameters.name: DProfileOffset
parameters.description: Value by which to offset the reference plane for the sketch

parameters.name: CrvIndex
parameters.description: Index of the edge to use if multiple intersecting edges exist

parameters.name: BReverseDir
parameters.description: If BOffset set to true, then true to reverse direction, false to not

parameters.name: BReverseFace
parameters.description: Reverse ProfileD1 and ProfileD2 if triangle profile - or - Reverse ProfileD1 and ProfileD2 and reverse ProfileD3 and ProfileD4 if polygon profile

parameters.name: BUseLenDim
parameters.description: True to use ProfileD4, false to use ProfileAngle

parameters.name: Faces
parameters.description: Array of faces that form the bases of this gusset feature

title: IFeatureManager.InsertGussetFeature2
description: Inserts a gusset feature for the specified faces.
signature:
Feature InsertGussetFeature2( 
   System.Double
Depth
,
   System.Int16
DirType
,
   System.Int16
LocType
,
   System.Boolean
BIsProfile
,
   System.Double
ProfileD1
,
   System.Double
ProfileD2
,
   System.Double
ProfileD3
,
   System.Double
ProfileAngle
,
   System.Double
ProfileD4
,
   System.Boolean
BOffset
,
   System.Double
DProfileOffset
,
   System.Int32
CrvIndex
,
   System.Boolean
BReverseDir
,
   System.Boolean
BReverseFace
,
   System.Boolean
BUseLenDim
,
   System.Object
Faces
)

parameters.name: Depth
parameters.description: Depth of the gusset

parameters.name: DirType
parameters.description: Direction in which to extrude the gusset: 0 = left side 1 = center 2 = right side

parameters.name: LocType
parameters.description: Location of the reference plane for the sketch of the gusset: 0 = start point 1 = midpoint 2 = end point

parameters.name: BIsProfile
parameters.description: True to use a polygon profile, false to use a triangle

parameters.name: ProfileD1
parameters.description: Length for Direction 1

parameters.name: ProfileD2
parameters.description: Length for Direction 2

parameters.name: ProfileD3
parameters.description: Length for Direction 3

parameters.name: ProfileAngle
parameters.description: Value for profile angle

parameters.name: ProfileD4
parameters.description: Length for Direction 4

parameters.name: BOffset
parameters.description: True to offset the reference plane for the sketch, false to not

parameters.name: DProfileOffset
parameters.description: Value by which to offset the reference plane for the sketch

parameters.name: CrvIndex
parameters.description: Index of the edge to use if multiple intersecting edges exist

parameters.name: BReverseDir
parameters.description: If BOffset set to true, then true to reverse direction, false to not

parameters.name: BReverseFace
parameters.description: Reverse ProfileD1 and ProfileD2 if triangle profile - or - Reverse ProfileD1 and ProfileD2 and reverse ProfileD3 and ProfileD4 if polygon profile

parameters.name: BUseLenDim
parameters.description: True to use ProfileD4, false to use ProfileAngle

parameters.name: Faces
parameters.description: Array of faces that form the bases of this gusset feature

remarks:
Instead of using this method, you can:
Select two faces in the graphics area that are the supporting legs of this gusset.
Call
IFeatureManager::InsertGussetFeature3
.
